USE ny_taxi_discovery;

-- Explore a folder

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2021/month=01/*',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'ny_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result];


-- Explore subfolders

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2021/**',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'ny_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result];

-- Get data from more than one file

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ('trip_data_green_csv/year=2021/month=01/*',
        'trip_data_green_csv/year=2021/month=02/*'),
        DATA_SOURCE = 'ny_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result];

-- Use more than 1 wildcard characters

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'ny_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result];

-- File metadata function filename()

SELECT
    result.filename() AS file_name,
    COUNT(*) record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'ny_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY
    result.filename()
ORDER BY
    result.filename();

-- Limit data using filename()

SELECT
    result.filename() AS file_name,
    COUNT(*) record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'ny_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
WHERE result.filename() IN ('green_tripdata_2020-01.csv', 'green_tripdata_2021-01.csv')
GROUP BY
    result.filename()
ORDER BY
    result.filename();

-- Use filepath function
SELECT
    result.filename() AS file_name,
    result.filepath() AS file_path,
    result.filepath(1) AS year,
    result.filepath(2) AS month,
    COUNT(*) record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'ny_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY
    result.filename(), result.filepath(), result.filepath(1), result.filepath(2)
ORDER BY
    result.filename(), result.filepath(), result.filepath(1), result.filepath(2);

-- Use filepath in WHERE
SELECT
    result.filename() AS file_name,
    result.filepath() AS file_path,
    result.filepath(1) AS year,
    result.filepath(2) AS month,
    COUNT(*) record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'ny_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
WHERE result.filepath(1) = '2020'
    AND result.filepath(2) IN ('06', '07', '08')
GROUP BY
    result.filename(), result.filepath(), result.filepath(1), result.filepath(2)
ORDER BY
    result.filename(), result.filepath(), result.filepath(1), result.filepath(2);
